title: Our new neighbour 我们的新邻居
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question. Why is Nigel a lucky man? 听录音，然后回答问题。为什么说奈杰尔很幸运?

text_and_translation.text: Nigel is our new next-door neighbour. He's a pilot.
text_and_translation.translation: 奈杰尔是我们新搬来的隔壁邻居。他是个飞行员。

text_and_translation.text: He will fly to New York next month.
The month after next he'll fly to Tokyo.
text_and_translation.translation: 再下个月他将飞往东京。

text_and_translation.text: At the moment, he's in Madrid. He flew to Spain a week ago.
text_and_translation.translation: 现在他在马德里。他是一星期以前飞到西班牙的。

text_and_translation.text: He'll return to London the week after next.
text_and_translation.translation: 再下个星期他将返回伦敦。

text_and_translation.text: He's only forty-one years old, and he has already been to nearly every country in the world.
text_and_translation.translation: 他只有41岁，但他却去过世界上几乎所有的国家。

text_and_translation.text: Nigel is a very lucky man. But his wife isn't very lucky. She usually stays at home!
text_and_translation.translation: 奈杰尔是个很幸运的人。但他的妻子运气不很好。她总是呆在家里!

notes.title: next-door neighbour
notes.describe: 隔壁邻居。next-door是一个复合词，作定语。
